dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1066 IH: Ending Green Giveaways Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Flood (for himself, Mr. Finstad, Mr. Collins, Ms. Hageman, Ms. Maloy, and Mr. Perry) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To repeal section 138 of the Clean Air Act, relating to environmental and climate justice block grants.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ending Green Giveaways Act.

section.header: Repeal and rescission relating to environmental and climate justice block grants

subsection.text: Section 138 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7438) is repealed.
The unobligated balance of any amounts made available under section 138 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7438) (as in effect on the day before the date of enactment of this Act) is rescinded.
